panels.description: Switch ports configured with a route, that are currently inactive.
panels.title: Switches State

panels.description: Switch ports configured with a route, that are currently inactive.

targets.expr:
nvswitch_interface_oper_state{cluster="$cluster", switch_hostname=~"$hostname"} != 1
AND on(cluster, interface, switch_hostname)
nvswitch_interface_flags{cluster="$cluster", switch_hostname=~"$hostname"} % 2 == 1

panels.title: Switch Ports Unreachable
